name: jquery_selectors_mergez
description: The purpose of this package is to allow users to quickly select and change various elements.

scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'updated' && git push && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.commitThis: git add . && git commit -m 'updated' && git push
scripts.start: npm run commitThis &&  npm run updateVersion && npm publish

author: Lesley Cheung (www.github.com/zen-out)
